columns.Actor_ID: The unique identifier for each actor.
columns.Name: The full name of the actor.
columns.Musical_ID: The unique identifier for the associated musical.
columns.Character: The name of the character played by the actor.
columns.Duration: The time period during which the actor performed.
columns.age: The age of the actor at the time of performance.

actor.table_description: The table tracks actors, their roles, and performance durations in musicals.

columns.Musical_ID: The unique identifier for each musical.
columns.Name: The title of the musical.
columns.Year: The year the musical was released.
columns.Award: The name of the award received.
columns.Category: The category of the award for which nomination was made.
columns.Nominee: The name of the nominee for the award.
columns.Result: The outcome of the nomination (e.g., Won, Nominated).

musical.table_description: The table tracks musicals, nominees, awards, and their results over the years.
